member.name: T:MyIOTPoc.API.Setup.MediatrExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for setting up MediatR.

member.name: T:MyIOTPoc.API.Setup.OpenTelemetryExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for setting up OpenTelemetry logging, tracing, and metrics.

member.name: M:MyIOTPoc.API.Setup.OpenTelemetryExtensions.AddOpenTelemetryLogging(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds OpenTelemetry logging to the logging builder.

member.name: M:MyIOTPoc.API.Setup.OpenTelemetryExtensions.AddOpenTelemetryTracingAndMetrics(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Adds OpenTelemetry tracing and metrics to the service collection. Will add traces. These traces are called activities in .NET as they are built on top of System.Diagnostics.
